title: Most valuable Swiss watch brands worldwide 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million CHF in the y axis.
The Brand value in million CHF is appeared to be the highest at Brand Rolex and lowest at Brand Rado.
The Brand value in million CHF of Brand Rado is 22.05% smaller than the maximum value at Rolex.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million CHF in the y axis.
The Brand value in million CHF is appeared to be the highest at Brand Rolex and lowest at Brand Rado.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million CHF in the y axis.
The Brand value in million CHF is appeared to be the highest at Brand Rolex and lowest at Brand Rado.
The Brand value in million CHF of Brand Rado is 22.05% smaller than the maximum value at Rolex.
max_summary: This bar chart has 16 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million CHF in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Rolex has the highest Brand value in million CHF and Rado has the lowest Brand value in million CHF.
The difference of Brand value in million CHF between the highest and lowest Brand is 7052.0.
The Brand Rolex has the highest Brand value in million CHF, followed by Omega, and Patek Philippe. Down to the Brand Rado which is the lowest.
The lowest value 335.0 at Rado is almost 5.17 times smaller than the average value 1427.5.
The Brand value in million CHF is 22840.0 if we add up values of all Brands.
